issue.title: [CF 713] Stormlash bugs icon cooldown
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Have a set of normal abilities cooldowns
2. Pop stormlash

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The icons stops tracking cooldown of abilities while stormlash is up. It refreshes when stormlash effect ends. I don't know if this happens only on my shaman (enhancement btw).

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.1.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No, I will provide it after raid, just noticed it and raid starts in a bit.

Edit: Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:155: table index is nil
Time: 11/29/12 13:17:06
Count: 288

comments.body:
Fixed with 6.1.1 version, thanks!!


> Posted by CurseForge user Fluflis
